name: The Warden's Sequence
description:
Being one of my earliest games I put a lot of time into the whole thing is very incomplete, however I think it has some interesting mechanics.

  • The player has a collection of tiles which they can place to form defenses
  • Tiles have numbers around their border which indicate how much of a shield they grant to neighboring tiles in that direction
  • This means you need to strategically place your tiles in a formation that maximizes the amount of shield you're getting
  • Tiles also have keywords which further affect where you position them for maximum benefits
  • Different enemy types also require you to use different strategies
